Privacy Policy Creekside Cigar Co respects your privacy. If you sign up for any of our engagement and outreach programs, including those that use SMS text messaging, we ONLY use information you provide to transmit your mobile messages and, upon request, respond to you directly. This includes sharing information with our program partners, message content providers, phone companies, and vendors who assist us in the delivery of mobile messages. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, WE DO NOT SELL, RENT, LOAN, TRADE, LEASE OR OTHERWISE TRANSFER FOR PROFIT ANY PHONE NUMBERS OR CUSTOMER INFORMATION COLLECTED THROUGH PROGRAMS TO ANY THIRD PARTY. We do reserve the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation or governmental request, to avoid liability, or to protect our rights or property. When you complete forms online or otherwise provide us information at point of sale, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and true information. Business News Top Stories Owner of Cork Bar & Restaurant to sell business after nearly a decade in Wilkes-Barre By Times Leader - February 2, 2017 Facebook Twitter Pinterest Linkedin ReddIt Email Print üîä Listen to this Tired of ads? Subscribers enjoy a distraction-free reading experience. Click here to subscribe today or Login . WILKES-BARRE ‚Äî Ruth Corcoran is like a jack of all trades. The owner of Cork Bar & Restaurant on Madison Street said, in addition to managing, she has worked in nearly every aspect of her business, including planning the menu; serving as a hostess, waitress and bartender; even helping prepare appetizers and other small plates in the kitchen. ‚ÄúShe never dish washes,‚Äù chimed in bar manager Carolyn Saporito. ‚ÄúNo, I don‚Äôt dish wash,‚Äù Corcoran said, laughing. Corcoran recently announced she will sell the restaurant and wine bar, which has been open since September 2007, to area businessman Rob Friedman. She said they hope to close the sale in mid-April. The 3,400-square-foot property is listed for $210,000 through Mericle Commercial Real Estate, according to the real estate agency‚Äôs website. Though Corcoran said she will miss the business and her customers, she believes it‚Äôs the right time to leave. Corcoran Communications, Corcoran‚Äôs public relations business, recently expanded to include Cor Strategic Group, which focuses on marketing for credit unions. She also plans to spend more time with family. ‚ÄúMy mother‚Äôs very ill,‚Äù said Corcoran. ‚ÄúShe has Parkinson‚Äôs (disease) and she lives in the Lehigh Valley. I think that that kind of was the deciding factor.‚Äù Corcoran said the restaurant got off to a rough start, opening just before the Great Recession that spanned from late 2007 through 2009. Even as a public relations professional with some experience in the food industry, Corcoran said she was unprepared for the difficulties she would encounter, like staff issues, keeping customers happy and keeping up with the ever-changing marketplace. ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt think owning a restaurant was going to be as hard as it was,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt is, of all the businesses I‚Äôve ever done ‚Ä¶ this is the hardest thing I‚Äôve ever done.‚Äù She said making the experience at Cork unique helped bring more customers through the doors, and it allowed the business to grow by 20 percent in each of the last few years. Some events include annual Mardi Gras and Cinco de Mayo celebrations, drink specials on the patio and, Corcoran‚Äôs favorite, The Dog Days of Summer, a fundraising event for the Luzerne County SPCA in which a portion of proceeds are donated to the shelter. ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs been very important to me is that I‚Äôve been able to use this business to give back to the community,‚Äù she said. Corcoran also credits her ‚Äúloyal customer base‚Äù for the restaurant‚Äôs success. ‚ÄúWhile a lot of other places closed, we were able to make it,‚Äù she said of those first few years. Friedman, owner of the Beaumont Inn in Dallas Township and Grico‚Äôs in Exeter, said he hopes to continue the success that Corcoran has built over the years. He plans to keep the staff and promote Saporito to manager of Cork. ‚ÄúHopefully we can move it forward even more,‚Äù he said. Friedman said he enjoys being able to keep local establishments just that ‚Äî local. ‚ÄúI live in this area, I love living in this area, and I appreciate the fact I‚Äôm able to expand and build businesses in this area,‚Äù he said. Friedman also owns Friedman Farms in Dallas Township, the River Street Jazz Cafe in Plains Township and Friedman Electric, which has 17 locations in Pennsylvania and New York. Ruth Corcoran poses for a portrait in the upstairs dining room of the Cork Bar & Resturant in Wilkes-Barre. Corcoran recently announced she is selling the restaurant to local business owner Rob Friedman. https://www.timesleader.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/web1_TTL020317Cork1.jpg Ruth Corcoran poses for a portrait in the upstairs dining room of the Cork Bar & Resturant in Wilkes-Barre. Corcoran recently announced she is selling the restaurant to local business owner Rob Friedman. Sean McKeag | Times Leader Restaurant owner to focus on family, other businesses By Sarah Hite Hando [email¬†protected] Reach Sarah Hite Hando at 570-704-3945. Founders | Founders Cigar Company | Veteran Owned Cigars + Accessories Skip to content Home Shop Cigars Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Legacy Blends Find A Retailer About Us Blog Contact Us Corporate Gifting Home Shop Cigars Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Legacy Blends Find A Retailer About Us Blog Contact Us Corporate Gifting $ 0.00 0 Cart Premium Cigars from a Veteran Owned, Top-Rated Cigar Brand Discover Our Small-Batch Blends from a Veteran-Owned Premium Cigar Brand Crafted for Character: Premium Cigar Blends You Can Buy Online or at your Favorite Cigar Shop Our cigars are from the Dominican Republic, rolled with care, and ready for you to enjoy with your friends and family. Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Premium Cigars Paired with Cigar Education + Community At Founders Cigar Company, we‚Äôre here to equip both seasoned cigar enthusiasts and those new to the cigar world with premium cigars from a top cigar brand you can trust. Whether you‚Äôre looking to buy cigars online for a special occasion or to enjoy your everyday ritual, our collection delivers bold flavor, consistent craftsmanship, and a legacy of excellence. We‚Äôre also passionate about education‚Äî our blog is packed with helpful guides on how to cut a cigar , light a cigar , and navigate cigar culture and etiquette with confidence. From first light to final draw, Founders is your go-to veteran-owned cigar brand for quality, knowledge, and community. Gift a Custom Cigar Box At Founders Cigar Company, we‚Äôve created the ultimate custom cigar box‚Äîa premium gift that‚Äôs as personal as it is unforgettable. Whether you‚Äôre shopping for corporate gifting, groomsmen gifts, bachelor parties, or Father‚Äôs Day, our cigar box is designed to leave a lasting impression. Each handcrafted box includes 16 premium cigars from a top cigar brand, along with a high-quality cutter and lighter‚Äîeverything they need to enjoy a perfect smoke. What makes it truly special? You can customize the lid with your logo, name, date, or personal message, turning it into a keepsake that‚Äôs both stylish and meaningful. Whether you‚Äôre celebrating milestones or building client relationships, Founders‚Äô custom cigar box delivers quality, character, and craftsmanship in every detail. Order yours today. Ask Your Local Cigar Shop for Founders Cigars‚Äã We love when cigar enthusiasts shop local‚Äîthere‚Äôs nothing like enjoying a premium cigar from your favorite hometown lounge or retailer. If your local cigar shop doesn‚Äôt carry Founders Cigars yet, ask them to! As a veteran-owned premium cigar brand, we‚Äôre proud to be featured in cigar shops across the country, and we‚Äôd be honored to be on the shelves of your favorite spot. Whether you‚Äôre looking to buy cigars locally or help introduce a top cigar brand to your community, your support helps us grow and share our passion for premium cigars with more enthusiasts like you. Find A Retailer Near You! We Believe In Supporting Veterans + Local Communities At Founders, We Support Our Veterans Cigars Donated 0 Cigars Donated 0 About Founders Cigar Company Founders began with a small group of friends who started meeting weekly for bonfires and cigars in the early days of the 2020 pandemic. At a time when the rest of the world was shut down, cigars served as a surprising catalyst for connection. Today, we‚Äôre here to provide you with premium cigars and the cigar education you‚Äôre looking for. Cork‚Äôs is your hometown local pub where everyone knows your name. ¬† Come enjoy our great Happy Hour 12 to 7 pm with $2 Select Drafts, $3 Wells, and $3.50 House Wines or step it up a try any of our Florida brews on tap.¬† We have a great selection of Whiskeys and Scotch to pair with one of our cigars.¬† We carry Rocky Patel, Joya, Oliva, Leaf by Oscar, Acid, Cohiba, Tabaks, Monte Cristo, and more. Cork‚Äôs is your bar!¬† We are a family-owned local bar located in Historic Downtown Bradenton of Old Main Street.¬† Cork and Susan Miller have owned Cork‚Äôs for 10 plus years and consider all that come in family.¬† We proudly support our Crew of Hernando Desoto and many other local organizations.¬† Cork‚Äôs is a relaxed-style pub where you can enjoy a great happy hour or order a top-shelf bourbon. Cheers and we hope you enjoy your time at Cork‚Äôs. further education and training over 25,000 learners participating in further education & training READ MORE Cork ETB Showcase Community National Schools Community National Schools (CNSs) are state, co-educational, multi-denominational primary schools underpinned by five core values: Excellence in Education, Care, Equality, Community and Respect. CNSs are under the patronage of the local Education and Training Boards (ETBs). CNSs give equal opportunities to all children. In the communities they serve and strive to provide high quality education through respectful, positive, supportive and responsive learning environments. FIND OUT MORE Community Special Schools Cork Education and Training Board currently has four Community Special Schools: Carrigaline Community Special School Rochestown Community Special School East Cork Community Special School North Cork Community Special School FIND OUT MORE Creative Steps to Well-being Wellness means something different to everyone, so browse the following selections and click on one that best suits your needs. FIND OUT MORE A Pathway for Every Learner Cork Education and Training Board was established under the Education and Training Boards Act, 2013 and is responsible and accountable for the proper direction and control of its functions in the Cork City and Cork County Councils‚Äô local authority areas. Cork ETB is the only statutory body in Cork with the responsibility to provide education and training across a broad range of services. Œî Frequently Asked Questions Are reservations available? Seating at Cork is on a first-come, first-served basis only for parties of eight or fewer. If your party has eight or less people, check in at our host stand when you arrive at the restaurant, and we will be sure to get you seated and dining as soon as possible! If your party has nine or more people, please call us for reservation availability . Please note that we have limited reservations available for large parties. *Any size reservations are welcome for Valentine's Day, New Year's Eve, and our specialty holiday buffets. Do you have gift cards available? Yes, you can purchase e-gift cards and mailed gift cards online, or you can purchase gift cards in person at Cork or any other RedWater location. Our gift cards are available for use at all RedWater Restaurants, RedWater golf shops, RedWater public golf courses, and LiveGolf Studios indoor golf simulator facilities. View complete information and purchase a gift card online. How do I view the balance on my gift card? You can check your gift card balance online¬†here . How do I book a private event? Cork has multiple private rooms available, as well as several options available to the public. You can get more information about hosting events with us on our Private Dining page or complete the Private Dining form above. Simply provide some information about your event, and a Cork or RedWater Events manager will get in touch with you about booking your gathering. Do you offer takeout? Yes, takeout is available at our restaurant. For your convenience, you can place your takeout order on our website. We also accept takeout orders over the phone. If you would like to pay for your takeout order with a gift card or a Golf Club member number, please call the restaurant to place your order, as these payment options are not currently available through online ordering. Takeout service may be unavailable when Cork is extremely busy so we can remain focused on the service of our dine-in guests. Does Cork offer vegetarian options? Yes, Cork offers several vegetarian dishes that are denoted on our menu. (Please note that items denoted as vegetarian may contain eggs and dairy.) Many of our other dishes can be modified to be vegetarian. Our chefs are always happy to prepare customized dishes for guests upon request, so talk with your server about additional options for your specific dietary needs. Does Cork offer gluten-free options? Yes, Cork offers several items made without gluten-containing ingredients, and denoted on our menus. However, our kitchen is not a gluten-free environment, so it is possible these menu items could come into contact with gluten during preparation. If you‚Äôre highly sensitive to gluten, please let your server know upon being seated. How does Cork accommodate specific allergy requirements? Our chefs are always happy to prepare customized dishes for guests upon request, so talk with your server about your specific dietary needs. If you‚Äôre allergic or highly sensitive to any ingredient, please let your server know upon being seated. What is the dress code at Cork? Come as you are! Cork does not have a required dress code. We pride ourselves on a relaxed, casual atmosphere. Do you allow dogs at Cork? Although we love furry friends, only service dogs are allowed in our restaurant and on our patio. What are your holiday hours? Our holiday hours vary depending on the holiday. Cork is closed on Christmas and New Year‚Äôs day to allow our team to spend time with family and friends. Please note that Cork may close early on holidays or days before holidays at the discretion of the management team. Please call to ensure we are open if you are planning to visit us close to closing time on those days. Do you offer catering? At RedWater Restaurants, our primary focus is on in-restaurant dining. However, we do offer some limited catering options that can be found on our RedWater Events website . Please contact our RedWater Events team for more information. Do you have loyalty rewards? Join RedWater Rewards for exclusive discounts and monthly deals at Cork, as well as RedWater's 8 other restaurants around West Michigan! For only $59 per year, enjoy VIP-only monthly deals. Visit the RedWater Rewards page of our website for more information or to sign up. What safety measures do you take in your restaurants? The health and safety of our guests and team members is always our top priority. In addition to our participation in the ServSafe Dining Commitment, we are in constant contact with our local health departments to ensure that we provide a safe environment for our guests and staff. Learn more about our commitment to safety. What if my question isn‚Äôt answered here? You can view more frequently asked questions and their answers on our RedWater Restaurants website or complete the Information Request form above to contact our team at Cork. Join Our Team Cork holds a special place in the heart of the RedWater family as its first restaurant. Join us in continuing the tradition of exceptional service and remarkable meals! Whether you‚Äôre looking for a part-time job or a career in the hospitality industry, there is no better team to join than RedWater. RedWater Benefits Positive, team-oriented workplace with great growth opportunities Flexible scheduling with both part-time and full-time positions Competitive compensation Employee Stock Ownership Plan for eligible employees Healthcare benefits for full-time employees Discounts at all RedWater restaurants RedWater Fitness discounts Discounted golf at select RedWater golf clubs Inquire for full details about RedWater's employee benefits. Contact Ciano Art ‚Äì Reach Out for Enquiries or Commissions Home About Me Artist Statement Blog Collected Works Archive Originals Available Catalogue Contact Select Page Contact Ciano Art Have a question or want to connect about a specific piece? Use the form below to contact Ciano Art directly. Send a Message to Ciano Art Name Email Address Message Submit Why Contact Ciano Art? Whether you‚Äôre a collector interested in bold original abstract art or a gallery seeking fresh contemporary work, contacting Ciano Art connects you directly with the artist behind emotionally resonant and thought-provoking pieces. Ciano‚Äôs large-scale artworks are known for their raw energy, layered symbolism, and rebellious visual language ‚Äî ideal for those who value originality and expression. Ciano has exhibited in Cork and beyond, and works with collectors and professionals across Ireland and internationally. Every enquiry is handled personally and with care, whether you‚Äôre asking about an available piece, need guidance choosing the right artwork for your space, or want to learn more about upcoming exhibitions. Follow the Creative Process To see what happens behind the scenes ‚Äî including new work, studio updates, and works-in-progress ‚Äî follow Ciano Art on Instagram. It‚Äôs a great way to stay connected and see new pieces as they emerge. Learn More About the Artist If you‚Äôd like to better understand the creative influences and journey behind Ciano Art, you can also read the artist statement here . It offers insight into the philosophy and evolution of the work. Final Note Whether your message is about acquiring artwork, featuring it in an exhibition, or simply connecting ‚Äî don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out. Contact Ciano Art today and start the conversation. Prefer to reach out via social? Connect with me below. Follow Follow Follow Follow Ciano is an Irish visual artist based in Cork.
